prompts.name: Codebase Diagnostics
prompts.description: Systematically diagnose issues in codebases including bugs, performance problems, security vulnerabilities, architecture issues, and technical debt

arguments.name: scope
arguments.description: Specific files, directories, or areas to analyze (e.g., 'src/auth/**', 'performance issues', 'security')

arguments.name: symptoms
arguments.description: Reported symptoms or problems (e.g., 'slow build times', 'memory leaks', 'failing tests')

prompts.name: Hiring Manager Codebase Evaluation
prompts.description: A hiring manager prompt for evaluating a codebase against job listing requirements.

prompts.name: Documentation Generation Chain
prompts.description: A comprehensive chain for creating high-quality technical documentation with proper structure, formatting, and best practices

arguments.name: project_info
arguments.description: Information about the project to document

arguments.name: doc_type
arguments.description: Type of documentation to create (e.g., API Reference, User Guide)

arguments.name: depth_level
arguments.description: Depth level of the documentation (default: intermediate)

prompts.name: Test Prompt
prompts.description: A test prompt to verify the --init workflow
